plot: A young woman seeking solace from a bitter breakup undergoes an awkward series of encounters with people of questionable intention.
title: Consoling Pamela Monroe
plot_es: A young woman seeking solace from a bitter breakup undergoes an awkward series of encounters with people of questionable intention.
plot_en: A young woman seeking solace from a bitter breakup undergoes an awkward series of encounters with people of questionable intention.
